00006 {

00015          op==MINET_NOP ? "MINET_NOP" : "UNKNOWN");
00016   return os;

00049 void MinetMonitoringEventDescription::Serialize(const int fd) const
00050 {
00051   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&timestamp,sizeof(timestamp))!=sizeof(timestamp)) {
00052     throw SerializationException();
00053   }
00054   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&source,sizeof(source))!=sizeof(source)) {
00055     throw SerializationException();

00058     throw SerializationException();

00061     throw SerializationException();

00064     throw SerializationException();
00065   }
00066   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&optype,sizeof(optype))!=sizeof(optype)) {

00129 void MinetMonitoringEvent::Serialize(const int fd) const
00130 {
00131   const char *buf=this->c_str();
00132   int len=strlen(buf);
00133   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&len,sizeof(len))!=sizeof(len)) {
00134     throw SerializationException();
00135   }
00136   if (writeall(fd,buf,len)!=len) {
00137     throw SerializationException();
00138   }
00139 }

00141 void MinetMonitoringEvent::Unserialize(const int fd)
00142 {
00143   int len;
00144   if (readall(fd,(char*)&len,sizeof(len))!=sizeof(len)) {
00145     throw SerializationException();
00146   }
00147   char buf[len+1];
00148   if (readall(fd,buf,len)!=len) {
00149     throw SerializationException();
00150   }
00151   buf[len]=0;
00152   this->operator=(MinetMonitoringEvent(buf));
00153 }
